Weather_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I put my heart into the feed for the goats,
and now the rain's gone and ruined it...
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thanks for finding the white goats!<sp:0:4:0>They're over there now, munching on
<clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>'s feed as if nothing
happened.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Erm...<sp:5:0:0> If it's not too much trouble,
why not go over and look at the goats'
fuzzy little faces?
I'm sure they'll be happy to spend quality
time with the fella who saved them.
Weather_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive>Goats have impressive appetites.<sp:5:0:0> The
thunder might rumble, but they just 
munch on their feed, calm as you like.
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>You'll stop by next time you're in the
area, right?<sp:0:4:0>I'd give you a big welcome back, and I
know the white goats would too!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thanks for finding the white goats!<sp:0:4:0>They're munching on <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>'s
special feed as if nothing happened.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You can see it in their little eyes...
<sp:5:1:0>They're expressing gratitude to the
man who saved them.
Talk2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I know, I know. The prized white goats of
Tabantha Bridge Stable are the cutest
things you've ever seen, right?<sp:5:0:0> RIGHT!
I'm sure it'll come as no surprise that I'm
quite particular about their feed. I want to
make sure they stay healthy!
Move_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I just know I'll make some really fine feed
today. I can just see their happy little goat
faces now!
Talk2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>First I need to go and gather the ingredients...<sp:5:0:0>
Then, as long as I don't lose the special recipe...

I should be able to whip up some feed so delicious,
it'll make the darling goats bleat for joy!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Move_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>Hoo! I put in some work today!<sp:0:4:0>My body's aching from taking care of
the goats, but the stable will be nice
and relaxing.
Talk2002:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Not too long ago, I got my hands on a special recipe.
I'll be able to show my culinary skills to my beloved
goats any day now...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Weather_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>From the looks on their faces, you can tell
the goats are fine with getting a bit
wet from the rain.
But I'm going to retreat to a spot with a
roof so I don't catch a cold.
